content.raw:
Note we may want to remove `developers()` so external OSRF people does not receive a mails.

developers and other labels are defined in the help for [sendTo section](https://jenkinsci.github.io/job-dsl-plugin/#path/javaposse.jobdsl.dsl.helpers.publisher.PublisherContext.extendedEmail-triggers-success-sendTo). developers emans ` // Sends an email to all the people who caused a change in the change set. `
content.html:
Note we may want to remove developers() so external OSRF people does not receive a mails.

developers and other labels are defined in the help for sendTo section. developers emans // Sends an email to all the people who caused a change in the change set.
